1270:1: vādī prāha| yadi kaścidvadedasti sattvo yāvatsanti prāṇā asti jīva ityādi|
1270:7: yathārhattvaphalaṃ kasmiṃścideva kāle vidyamānamapi pūrvaṃ paścāccāvidyamānatvādabhāva iti jñāyate|
1270:8: yathā ca dvītīyo mūrdhā tṛtīyo hastaśca|
1270:21: yabhdavatoktaṃ [yathā] dvitīyasya mūrdhnastṛtīyasya hastasya cādṛśyatvāda-[bhāvaḥ] arhattva-[phalasyāpya]bhāvaḥ iti spaṣṭam|
1270:23: dvitīyasya mūrdhno nāstitve'pi tarhi na prathamasya nāstitvam|
1270:29: yadyapi binduparimāṇaṃ na jñāyate tathāpyastyeva sāgaraḥ|
1270:33: yadi na śakyate vaktaṃ tadā bhavata evārthahāniḥ|
1270:37: yathā rātrau taruṃ dṛṣṭvā citte saṃśayaḥ|
1270:39: na khalū taruḥ sthāṇoḥ puruṣasya vo[palabdhau] niyato hetuḥ|
1270:40: anupalabdhireva nirvāṇasyābhāve niyato heturiti cennātra saṃśayasambhavaḥ|
1270:51: kiñca yadi vipākasya vināśaheturvartata iti cennocyate|
1270:57: yadi sāgarodakasabhdāvānnirvāṇasabhdāvaḥ siddhastadā kiṃ dvitīyasyāpi mūrdhnaḥ sabhdāvo na sidhyati|
1270:58: dvitīyasyāpi mūrdhnaḥ sabhdāvo na siddha iti cet kathaṃ nirvāṇasya sabhdāvaḥ|
1270:59: tasmābhdavatoktaḥ sāgarodakadṛṣṭāntaḥ nirvāṇasabhdāvaṃ sādhayituṃ na samarthaḥ|
1270:66: yadyasato nirvāṇasya sattā tadā svato'sato'sattvamapi saditi cet,
1270:78: yadyakṛtakatvānnitya evātmeti tadā nityo'nitya veti saṃśayasyāsambhavaḥ|
1270:80: vādī| iyaṃ doṣāpattirna mamaivāpi tu sarveṣāmeva vādināṃ yathā śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāt|
1270:85: bhavatāṃ tūdāhṛto dṛṣṭānto mama saṃśayamutpādayati tasmādasiyo'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ|
1270:88: yatpunarbhavatoktaṃ sarveṣāmeva doṣāpattirna tu mamaivetyeṣa svadoṣa eva na tu paradoṣaḥ|
1270:90: yathā kaścidabhiyukta ātmānamaprakāśya sarva eva taskarā iti vadettadāsau puruṣa ātmānamapi taskaraṃ manyata iti jñeyam|
1270:92: idānīṃ yadi bhavānātmānaṃ prakāśayitumiḥcchu pūrvayuktimatikramya punarvaktumicchennūnaṃ bahudoṣāpattiḥ syāt|
1270:95: pañcamena doṣāvadhimicchan pūrvaṃ nātikrāmedataḥ bhavato'ntyaḥ pakṣaḥ punaruktaṃ bhavet|
1270:105: ato'yaṃ svayame sadoṣaḥ kathaṃ taṃ dūṣayet|
